mapper.select: SELECT c.REQ_NUM, b.EMP_CODE, b.EMP_NAME, c.REQ_DATE, c.CON_TYPE, c.TRGT, c.CON_TERM_START, c.CON_TERM_END, c.CON_AMT FROM CON_EXPENSE c INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE_BASIC b ON b.EMP_CODE = c.EMP_CODE WHERE c.REQ_DATE = #{reqDate} AND b.EMP_CODE = #{empCode} ORDER BY c.REQ_NUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CON_EXPENSE(REQ_NUM, EMP_CODE, EMP_NAME, REQ_DATE, CON_TYPE, TRGT, CON_TERM_START, CON_TERM_END, CON_AMT, REL, CON_PLACE, BANK, ACC_NUM, ACC_HOLDER, NOTE) VALUES (#{reqNum}, #{empCode}, #{empName}, #{reqDate}, #{conType}, #{trgt}, #{conTermStart}, #{conTermEnd}, #{conAmt}, #{rel}, #{conPlace}, #{bank}, #{accNum}, #{accHolder}, #{note})
mapper.update: UPDATE CON_EXPENSE SET REQ_NUM = #{reqNum}, EMP_CODE = #{empCode}, EMP_NAME = #{empName}, REQ_DATE = #{reqDate}, CON_TYPE = #{conType}, TRGT = #{trgt}, CON_TERM_START = #{conTermStart}, CON_TERM_END = #{conTermEnd}, CON_AMT = #{conAmt}, REL = #{rel}, CON_PLACE = #{conPlace}, BANK = #{bank}, ACC_NUM = #{accNum}, ACC_HOLDER = #{accHolder}, NOTE = #{note} WHERE EMP_CODE = #{empCode}
